name: Karate Fighting Art - Kung Fu Ninja Tiger actions
name_original: Karate Fighting Art - Kung Fu Ninja Tiger actions
description:
Play as pro ninja karate fighter to win kung fu fight in world martial art game.

Enjoy the world of the legends Karate fighters. If you love Karate games then play this kung Fu Karate championship game and enjoy the real time Karate competition of 2017. Its a full of thrill and action fighting game.

Comprehensive player customization module is added. You can make your own player by adding your favorite karate costume (Shirt,trouser), belt, head band and skin.

Features:

•Chose and customize your own karate hero player
• Level Mode & Career Mode Challenges
• Fight against toughest fighters and become world karate champion
• Kung Fu Karate tournaments with big rewards
• Get promoted by defeating fighter tournament legends
• Win karate matches & get rewarded points to unlock next tournament
• Background music & sound effects will boost your energy in karate ring

If you have any suggested features or improvements please leave a comment, or send us an email at ask.bulkysports@gmail.com
